sentences.sContent: The news aroused much fear in Germany.
sentences.sContent_eng: The news aroused much fear in Germany.
sentences.sCn: 这消息在德国引起很大恐慌。

sentences.sContent: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.sCn: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

phrases.pCn: 西德（原德意志联邦共和国的简称）
